905750.description:
Monstrous Lair #2: Troll Cave

A System Neutral Edition GM's Resource
by
Simon Butler
Monstrous Lair #2: Troll Caveprovides you--the busy, time-crunchedM--with the details to effortlessly bring to life the troll caves in your campaign. Are you a busy GM? Does session prep take too long? Do you never have time to work on the cool little details that can bring your adventures, dungeons and campaign to life? This short, focused compilation gives you, the time-crunched GM, the tools to effortlessly add verisimilitude and detail to your dungeons. Use the material herein either before or during play and bask in your players' adulation.
This book is compatible with every edition of the world's most popular role-playing game.
For a free sample, visit Raging Swan Press's website.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Michael Potter
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
